transcript: I can't be persistent forever, you know. You can't not have a job forever, you know. I gotta do something like, you gotta make money and get food on the table.

you gotta make money and get food on the table.

metadata.transcript_ground_truth: I mean, I can't- I can't be persistent forever, you know, you can't not have a job forever, you know, I've got- I've got to do something, I've got to make money and get food on the table.
